name: Arthur Abon
text: I honestly do not know if I should like these posts and comments because I know they are April Fool Jokes, or dislike so as to make sure no misunderstandin g takes place.

source_obj.text: I honestly do not know if I should like these posts and comments because I know they are April Fool Jokes, or dislike so as to make sure no misunderstandin g takes place.

replies.text: Sorry  Arthur Abon , I know what you mean, nagdalawang isip nga ako sa pagpost nito! Inassume ko na lang na matatalino naman ang mga friends ko in spite of the candidates they are supporting  :p
Haha Thanks sa vote of confidence I think.
Thank god for your comment! I've been so busy it slipped my mind what day it was and I was beginning to think my batchmates had gone nuts.
It's ok. My desk might not forgive you though for the damage it incurred when I banged my head on it. Hehehe.
